MySQL query:

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW wp_utt_lectures_view AS SELECT periodID, lectureID, semester, wp_utt_lectures.groupID, wp_utt_lectures.classroomID, wp_utt_lectures.teacherID, start, end, groupName, wp_utt_subjects.subjectID, wp_utt_subjects.title AS subjectTitle, wp_utt_subjects.type AS subjectType, color, wp_utt_classrooms.name AS classroomName, wp_utt_classrooms.type AS classroomType, surname as teacherSurname, wp_utt_teachers.name as teacherName FROM wp_utt_lectures, wp_utt_groups, wp_utt_subjects, wp_utt_classrooms, wp_utt_teachers WHERE wp_utt_lectures.groupID = wp_utt_groups.groupID AND wp_utt_groups.subjectID = wp_utt_subjects.subjectID AND wp_utt_lectures.classroomID = wp_utt_classrooms.classroomID AND wp_utt_lectures.teacherID = wp_utt_teachers.teacherID;
